/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees and bushes on both sides. 

Two billboards stand prominently on the right side of the road, one of which is red and the other blue. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the landscape.
